Features.title: Everything you need to stand out
Features.subtitle: Powerful AI tools to maximize your chances in every application
Features.f1Desc: Advanced algorithm that analyzes real compatibility between your profile and job requirements, considering experience, skills, and keywords.
Features.f2Desc: We identify exactly what's missing from your resume: skills, certifications, ATS keywords, and proper formatting.
Features.f3Desc: Our AI rewrites your experiences using impact language and metrics, aligning with what recruiters are looking for.
Features.f4Desc: Resumes formatted to pass through applicant tracking systems used by 99% of large companies.
Features.f5Desc: Export your optimized resume in professional PDF, editable Word, or text format for online systems.
Features.f6Desc: Track all your applications, match scores, and resume versions in a complete dashboard.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Get your questions answered about Job Matches
FAQ.q1: How does the resume generation process work?
FAQ.a1: You fill in your profile, paste the job description, and our AI analyzes the compatibility between your experience and the job requirements. Then it generates an optimized resume with the right keywords, professional formatting, and content tailored to that specific position.
FAQ.q2: Does AI really improve my resume?
FAQ.a2: Yes! Our AI is trained with thousands of successful resumes and real job requirements. On average, users see a 92% increase in match score after optimization, resulting in 3x more interview invitations.
FAQ.q3: What is ATS and why does it matter?
FAQ.a3: ATS (Applicant Tracking System) is the software used by most companies to filter resumes before a recruiter sees them. Our AI optimizes your resume with the right keywords and formatting so it passes these filters and reaches the recruiter's hands.
FAQ.q4: Can I create resumes for different jobs?
FAQ.a4: Yes! Each resume is tailored to a specific job description. You can create as many resumes as you want, each optimized for a different position. Just use 1 credit per resume generated.
FAQ.a5: We offer two professional templates: Modern (two-column layout with colored sidebar) and Classic (traditional single-column format). Both are optimized for ATS systems and designed to impress recruiters.
FAQ.q6: In which languages can I create my resume?
FAQ.a6: You can choose the language in which your resume will be generated. Our platform supports any language â€” just select the desired language during the creation process, and the AI will generate the optimized resume in that language. Apply to jobs anywhere in the world.
FAQ.q7: How does the credit system work?
FAQ.a7: Each generated resume consumes 1 credit and each interaction with the Training Agent consumes 1 credit. Your credits never expire. Purchase credit packages according to your needs and use them whenever you want.
FAQ.q8: Does the Training Agent ask questions about my field?
FAQ.a8: Yes! The training agent analyzes the job and your resume to ask specific technical and behavioral questions. If you're a developer, it asks about code. If you're in sales, it simulates real objections.
FAQ.q9: How long does it take to generate a resume?
FAQ.a9: The entire process takes just a few minutes. After you fill in your profile and paste the job description, our AI generates the optimized resume in under 60 seconds. You can download it immediately in PDF format, ready to send.
FAQ.a10: Completely. We use end-to-end encryption, do not sell your data, and you can delete your account and information at any time. We are GDPR compliant.

WhatsApp.message: Hi! I came from JobMatches and I need some support.

TrainingAgent.title: Simulate real interviews and receive a detailed performance report
TrainingAgent.subtitle: Our AI analyzes your resume and the target job to conduct realistic interviews with feedback on every answer and a complete performance analysis at the end.
TrainingAgent.creditNote: Use your credits to train with the Training Agent
TrainingAgent.feat1Desc: Technical, behavioral, or mixed questions tailored to your resume and the target job
TrainingAgent.feat2Desc: Receive constructive feedback with specific suggestions to improve each response
TrainingAgent.feat3Desc: Detailed report with scores, strengths, areas for improvement, and actionable tips
TrainingAgent.feat4Desc: Choose difficulty level, interview type, language, and specific focus areas
TrainingAgent.readySubtitle: Customize your interview experience and start practicing.
TrainingAgent.strength1: Excellent client relationship and negotiation skills
TrainingAgent.strength2: Clear demonstration of leadership with measurable results
TrainingAgent.improvement1: Prepare specific examples using the STAR method for behavioral questions
TrainingAgent.improvement2: Practice articulating metrics and KPIs from previous roles
TrainingAgent.summaryText: The candidate demonstrated strong leadership skills and a results-oriented approach. Clear examples of team management and client retention were provided with concrete metrics, showing excellent preparation for a Senior Sales Manager role.
TrainingAgent.coachMsg1:
Hi! My name is Ana and I'll be conducting this interview. Today, we'll focus on behavioral questions relevant to the Senior Sales Manager position.

âž¤ Question 1
Tell me about a time you had to turn around a struggling sales team. What strategies did you use and what were the results?
TrainingAgent.coachMsg2: I inherited a team with 60% quota attainment. I implemented weekly 1-on-1 coaching, restructured territories based on data, and created a mentorship program. Within 6 months, the team hit 115% of target.
TrainingAgent.coachMsg3:
Feedback:
âœ“ Strong leadership approach with concrete actions and measurable results.
ðŸ’¡ Consider mentioning how you handled resistance to change within the team.

âž¤ Question 2
How do you handle a key client who is considering switching to a competitor? Walk me through your approach.
TrainingAgent.coachMsg4: I schedule an in-person meeting to understand their concerns, present a tailored retention plan with added value, and involve senior leadership if needed. I retained 95% of at-risk accounts last year.
TrainingAgent.coachMsg5:
Feedback:
âœ“ Excellent client retention strategy with clear process and metrics.
ðŸ’¡ Mention how you identify at-risk clients proactively before they consider leaving.

âž¤ Question 3
Describe a situation where you had to negotiate a complex deal. What was your approach and outcome?
TrainingAgent.coachMsg6: I negotiated a $2M enterprise contract by mapping all stakeholders, addressing each department's needs individually, and creating a phased implementation plan. Closed in 45 days, 20% above initial target.

Terms.title: Terms of Use
Terms.metaDescription: Terms of Use for Job Matches platform.
Terms.acceptanceText: By accessing and using the Job Matches platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
Terms.serviceText: Job Matches provides an AI-powered platform for resume optimization, job matching analysis, and interview preparation. Our services include resume analysis, keyword optimization, ATS formatting, and virtual coaching through our Training Agent.
Terms.obligationsText: You agree to provide accurate information, use the platform only for lawful purposes, not share your account credentials, and not attempt to reverse-engineer, exploit, or misuse our AI systems or services.
Terms.intellectualPropertyText: All content, features, and functionality of the Job Matches platform â€” including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, AI models, and software â€” are the exclusive property of Job Matches and are protected by intellectual property laws. You retain ownership of the personal data and resume content you provide.
Terms.limitationText: Job Matches provides resume optimization suggestions powered by AI. We do not guarantee employment outcomes, interview invitations, or job offers. Our services are provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the platform.
Terms.terminationText: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the platform at any time, with or without cause, including but not limited to violation of these Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the service ceases immediately. Purchased credits are non-refundable after use.
Terms.changesText: We may update these Terms of Use at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. Your continued use of the platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
Terms.contactText: If you have questions about these Terms of Use, please contact us via WhatsApp support or at support@jobmatches.me.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.metaDescription: Privacy Policy for Job Matches platform.
Privacy.dataCollectionText: We collect information you provide directly, including your name, email address, phone number, location, resume content, and job descriptions you submit for analysis. We also collect usage data such as pages visited, features used, and interaction patterns.
Privacy.dataUsageText: Your data is used to provide and improve our services, including AI-powered resume analysis and optimization, match score calculations, Training Agent interview simulations, and personalized recommendations. We may also use anonymized, aggregated data to improve our AI models.
Privacy.cookiesText: We use essential cookies for platform functionality, including session management, language preferences, and theme settings. We may use analytics cookies to understand how users interact with our platform. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings.
Privacy.dataSharingText: We do not sell your personal data to third parties. We may share data with trusted service providers who assist in operating our platform (such as cloud hosting and payment processing), and when required by law or to protect our legal rights.
Privacy.dataSecurityText: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data, including end-to-end encryption, secure data storage, and regular security audits. However, no method of electronic transmission or storage is 100% secure.
Privacy.userRightsText: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data at any time. You can export your data, request account deletion, and withdraw consent for data processing. To exercise these rights, contact us through our support channels.
Privacy.dataRetentionText: We retain your personal data for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. Resume data and analysis results are stored until you delete them or request account deletion. After account deletion, data is permanently removed within 30 days.
Privacy.childrenText: Our services are not directed to individuals under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you become aware that a child has provided us with personal data, please contact us immediately.
Privacy.changesText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes by posting a notice on our platform. Your continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
Privacy.contactText: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, please contact us via WhatsApp support or at privacy@jobmatches.me.
